column4: is it possible to make a menu show up beside of the system menu >?
don't address people out of the blue. And AFAIK unless you want to hack around with the gnome-panel no.
you can create a new menu in Applications, but not a new menu next to Places or System or whatever. Unless you want to hack around with the source code its not going to happen
and as explained to you twice. Unless you make your own gnome panel applet its not going to happen.
